children.description:
Great, we now have a valid listing for rental properties in Rome.

#### Featured Property Details:
1. **Location:** Via Massa di San Giuliano, 295, Rome, Italy, in the neighborhood of Castelverde.
2. **Property Type:** Flat.
3. **Price:** €400 per month.
4. **Rooms:** 7 rooms; 1 bathroom.Rooms are 18 square meters, primarily for healthcare use.
5. **Floor:** 5th floor.
6. **Photos and More Information:** ![View Details](https://img4.idealista.it/blur/WEB_LISTING-M/0/id.pro.it.image.master/7d/c1/48/660950435.webp)
   - More specific room and property details on provided [link](https://www.idealista.it/immobile/31690522/)

This flat in the central area of Castelverde might be appealing due to several factors including utilities and healthcare occupational suitability given the sizes mentioned.

**Follow Up:**
- Review if the nature of potential healthcare or room specific use matches residential criteria.
- Visit the link for more properties like this that exist in our Idealista listing done specifically for your request on rentals in Rome.

This wraps up the comprehensive list intake in correspondence with detailed navigated request. You can find further details about each listing or explore additional alternatives by visiting the direct links supplied\vetIVE properties.

Should you desire more specific or perhaps distinct listing options by features, feel free to express so that I fetch results with refined preferences or rerun it; certainly adjusting to the desired configuration further!

{"return_type":"give_answer","final_answer":"I've found a rental property in Rome suitable for healthcare use:

**Location:** Via Massa di San Giuliano, 295, Rome, Italy, neighborhood of Castelverde.
**Type:** Flat.
**Price:** €400 per month.
**Rooms:** 7; with specialized rooms at 18.0 sqm suitable for healthcare use. One available with [Details Here](https://www.idealista.it/immobile/31690522/).

Should you have specialized needs or more properties to consider, feel free to let me know! Safe move to Rome!"}

function.name: properties_list_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "List properties for sale or rent in Italy, Spain, Portugal with options and filters"

locationname.description: The value of name field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint.

locationid.description: The value of locationId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with zoiId parameter

floorheights.description: One of the following topFloor|intermediateFloor|groundFloor (separated by comma for multiple values. Ex :  topFloor,groundFloor)

accessible.description: true|false - Whether or not is the property accessible

distance.description: The radius to look for properties inside

ispoi.description: true|false - Whether or not is it a point of interest, this parameter only works with zoiId parameter

maxitems.description: The number of items per response for paging purpose

zoiid.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint. Do NOT use together with locationId parameter

numpage.description: The page index for paging purpose

shape.description: The value of shape field returned in .../zois/detail endpoint. Simply pass the json object as string. Do NOT use together with locationId or zoiId. Ex : {\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"coordinates\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\":[[[[9.20289,45.469786,0],.

auction.description: Leave empty or one of the following : excludeAuctions|onlyAuctions

housemates.description: One of the following 2|3|4 (separated by comma for multiple values, Ex : 3,4)

sincedate.description: One of the following Y|W|M  (Last 48 hours|Last week|Last month)

function.name: zois_detail_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get information about specific zone of interest"

zoiid.description: The value of zoiId field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

function.name: properties_detail_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get property detail"

propertycode.description: The value of propertyCode field returned in .../properties/list endpoint

function.name: auto_complete_for_idealista_v2
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "idealista_v2", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get auto complete suggestion by term or phrase"

prefix.description: Any term or phrase that you are familiar with

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
